basics.name: Jérémy Buget
basics.label: CTO / Head of Engineering / Engineering Manager
basics.summary: CTO. Builder. Leader. Speaker. Writer. Father.

work.name: La Plateforme de l'inclusion
work.summary: French public service operator unifying digital services for employment inclusion, working at the crossroads of France Travail, local authorities, companies, and social inclusion actors.
highlights: Structured the organization: built the executive & cross-functional leadership team, created horizontal decision-making bodies, and advised on product team formation and restructuring.
Shaped and executed long-term strategy across technology and product.
Unified and optimized shared tools and services across teams, reducing costs and duplication.
Oversaw billing and administration of production tools and licenses.
Led cybersecurity: recruited and supervised an operational CISO, launched RGS compliance programs, co-authored DPIAs, and rolled out security tools and awareness campaigns.
Fostered technical communities and launched the 'Tools Circle' for cross-team collaboration.
Provided hands-on technical expertise, recruitment, and management support during critical team stages (exploration, scaling, decommissioning).
Represented the platform externally to partners, sponsors, vendors, and users, boosting visibility and credibility.

work.name: Pix
work.summary: French public digital service for assessing and certifying digital skills, serving millions of citizens throughout their lives.
highlights: Benchmarked the international market for digital skills assessment solutions.
Designed and implemented the technical stack from scratch.
Built and scaled a strong software engineering team.
Established an agile culture blending XP, Scrum, Kanban, Lean Development, and Lean Startup.
Facilitated rituals, collaborative workshops, and training sessions.
Restructured the tech organization into autonomous product teams.
Aligned platform development with the GIP’s strategic ambitions.
Supervised critical technical initiatives (security, performance, accessibility, interoperability, scalability, i18n).
Recruited and managed engineers across product teams.
Acted as technical representative for other departments, partners, and prospects.
Contributed to shaping and executing Pix’s operational strategy.

work.name: OCTO Technology
work.summary: Led OCTO’s WEBF tribe, dedicated to front-end web application development (corporate websites, business apps, complex UIs). Mission: guide clients, teammates, and the technical community through the web jungle.
highlights: Led a 16-person team: defined and carried the vision, ensured growth, staffing, ROI, and individual development.
Enabled team members to learn, thrive, and shine within and outside the organization.

work.name: OCTO Technology
work.summary: Consulting firm specialized in digital transformation and new technologies.
highlights: Responded to RFPs and pre-sales activities.
Built from scratch: Pix platform (as State Startup), Roland-Garros online ticketing, innovative insurance platform (Lean Startup, Java, OracleSQL), SwissLife online health forms.
Agile coaching: CNP Assurances, TF1.
Conducted codebase audit (~5M LOC) for Allianz.
Trainer: WebAssembly introduction, JavaScript basics, Agile seminars, Spring framework.

work.name: VISEO
work.summary: International IT services company helping organizations in their digital transformation, with expertise inherited from Objet Direct in Java/JEE, web architectures, and agile methods.
highlights: Delivered web/Java/RIA projects.
Facilitated agile project teams as ScrumMaster.
Conducted internal training sessions (notably on Spring).

work.name: People in action
work.summary: First professional role after graduation, where I learned full-stack web development and agile methodologies.
highlights: Developed web applications with Java/J2EE, Adobe Flex/Air, Tomcat, MySQL.
Practiced agile engineering: XP, TDD, BDD/ATDD, code reviews, Scrum, Kanban, DDD.

projects.name: EasyMock
projects.summary: Original creator of the class mocking mechanism and current lead developer.
